title.rendered: 21 Most Stunning Splits in Celebrity History

content.rendered:
We find it very difficult to talk about the following celebrity break-ups.

We’re still in shock that they happened. We’re still wishing the stars at the center of them give it another go with one another. But we’re not hopeful.

Here is a rundown of the splits that took us most aback when they went down…
